message.body: How did he say she lost it?
She GAVE IT UP?! I haven't talked to her. But Scotty said she LOST it. Ugh. Will we always be worrying about her?!
I dunno, that's just how Scotty phrased it when he told me.

Oh well she told me that she felt like the company didn't have good communication bc they promised her certain days off in the interview but then didn't follow through... But I was like, any job will be difficult to compromise with in the beginning bc they're paying you!!!!!
Especially cause she's always going on vacations. Like if you desperately need a job, you have to be available.
Yea... I don't think she wants something new. I think anxiety is weighing heavy on her
